flawed_nl_solution:
The original length of the bathroom is 96 sq ft/8 ft = <<96/8=12>>12 ft
The new length of the bathroom is 12ft + 2 ft = <<12+2=14>>14 ft
The new width of the bathroom is 8 ft + 2 ft = <<8+2=10>>10 ft
The new area of the bathroom is 14ft x 10 ft = <<14*10=104>>104 sq ft
#### 104

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 140, not 104. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
